attributes.action: take action to ensure that baby P is the last child to lose their life to child abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many babies and children are harmed, injured and even killed through child abuse. It is time that the professionals who are supposed to be responsible for the care of these children are held accountable for their actions. They too should be brought before the courts for negligence if any child in their care comes to harm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
